wikipedia.paragraphdump: . Not to be confused with The Blue Bottle Coffee House. Blue Bottle Coffee, Inc. is a coffee roaster and retailer headquartered in Oakland, California, United States. In 2017, a majority stake in the company was acquired by Nestl. It is considered a major player in third wave coffee.  The company focuses on single-origin beans. . The company while based in Oakland, California soon expanded to other areas around the country. Blue Bottle first expanded to several cafs in locations around San Francisco, including the Ferry Building and the San Francisco Museum of Modern Art's rooftop garden.  The company operated 29 stores in 2016, and it anticipates having more than 50 cafes open by end of 2017 in California, New York, Washington, D.C., Miami, Seoul and Tokyo. . W. James Freeman founded Blue Bottle Coffee in the early 2000s in Oakland, CA, borrowing the name from one of Europe's first cafes, The Blue Bottle Coffee House. His intention was to roast coffee in small batches (6 lbs. per roast) to sell within 24 hours of roasting, initially as a home-delivery service. Blue Bottle soon ceased deliveries and opened as a traditional cafe. . Blue Bottle opened additional locations in San Francisco and elsewhere in the San Francisco Bay Area, and then opened its first New York location in Williamsburg, Brooklyn in 2010.  The company-owned stores carry off-menu items such as the "Gibraltar", a form of cortado. . In 2012, Blue Bottle received $20 million in venture capital investment. . In January 2014, Blue Bottle raised $25.75 million in new round of funding. . In 2015, Blue Bottle completed a venture capital round in which it raised $70 million+ from investors led by Fidelity. . Since its inception, the company has raised $120 million from investors. . In September 2017, Nestle S.A., the world's largest food and drinks company, acquired a majority stake of Blue Bottle.  While the deal's financial details were not disclosed, the Financial Times reported "Nestle is understood to be paying up to $500m for the 68 per cent stake in Blue Bottle".  Blue Bottle expected to increase sales by 70% in 2017.  . In September 2018, Blue Bottle Coffee opened its first location in Kobe, Japan.  In May 2019, Blue Bottle Coffee opened its first location in Seoul, South Korea. .
wikipedia.Key people: W. James Freeman, FounderBryan Meehan, CEO

crunchbase.Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area,West Coast,Western US
crunchbase.smalldescription: Blue Bottle Coffee is a coffee roaster and retailer platform.
crunchbase.longdescription: Blue Bottle Coffee is a passionate team of hundreds around the world, united by the simple purpose of getting great coffee to everyone who asks for it whether that be in our cafes or at home. Blue Bottle is headquartered in Oakland, CA and have retail and business operations in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York, and Tokyo.
insights: Blue Bottle Coffee has raised a total of $117M in funding over 5 rounds. Their latest funding was raised on Jun 4, 2015 from a Series C round.
Blue Bottle Coffee is funded by 12 investors. Tetragon Financial Group LimitedandKindred Ventures are the most recent investors.
Blue Bottle Coffee has acquired 3 organizations. Their most recent acquisition was Perfect Coffee on Feb 2015.
Blue Bottle Coffee uses 31 technology products and services including Google Analytics,Google Tag Manager,andG Suite (formerly Google Apps for Work).
Blue Bottle Coffee is actively using 59 technologies for its website. These include Viewport Meta,IPhone / Mobile Compatible,andSPF.
Blue Bottle Coffee is ranked 178,044 among websites globally based on its 203,240 monthly web visitors.
Blue Bottle Coffee has 1 registered patent in the 'Furniture,Domestic Articles Or Appliances; Coffee Mills; Spice Mills' category.
Blue Bottle Coffee employees are showing high interest in Virtual Office,Bike to Work Day,andReno, Nevada.
Blue Bottle Coffee has $22M in estimated revenue annually. Blue Bottle Coffee competes with Philz Coffee,Craft Coffee,andChameleon Cold-Brew.
Blue Bottle Coffee has 4 current team members, including Founder James Freeman.

yahoo.paragraphdump: Photo: Step By Step L./Yelp. Ready for a new coffee shop to spice up your routine? You'll find a new Blue Bottle Coffee location at 199 Sutter St. in the Financial District.. Blue Bottle Coffee got its start more than 15 years ago in Oakland, and has since expanded around the Bay Area, across the U.S. and into Asia (the company recently announced that it's moving its roasting operations to Sacramento).. The roastery's latest San Francisco outpost on Sutter Street offers a full array of classic coffee drinks made with Blue Bottle Coffee's own roasts and blends. Stop in to this contemporary cafe for single-origin pour-overs, bags of beans and one of Blue Bottle's signatureLige waffles.. With a 3.5-star rating out of three reviews on Yelp so far, the new locale is finding its way, but it's still early days.. L B., who was among the first Yelpers to review the new spot on Oct. 26, wrote, "Very nice Blue Bottle with lots of seating. Fast service, friendly staff, great location.". Yelper Gloria T. added, Rude. Poor service. There are three Blue Bottles within a few minutes' walk and dozens of cafes around. No need to spend my daily dollars here.". Interested? Stop by to welcome the new business to the neighborhood. Blue Bottle Coffee is open from 6 a.m.6:30 p.m. on weekdays and 7 a.m.5 p.m. on weekends.. Want to keep your finger on the pulse of new businesses in San Francisco? Here's what else opened recently near you..
